services.name: Device
services.desc: The Device Information Service exposes manufacturer and/or vendor information about a device.

characteristics.name: Manufacturer_Name
characteristics.desc:
The value of this characteristic is a UTF-8 string representing the name of the manufacturer of 
the device.

characteristics.name: Serial_Number
characteristics.desc: The value of this characteristic is a variable-length UTF-8 string representing the serial number for a particular instance of the device.

services.name: Battery
services.desc: The Battery Service exposes the state of a battery within a device.

characteristics.name: Level
characteristics.desc: The current charge level of a battery. 100% represents fully charged while 0% represents fully discharged.

services.name: Environmental
services.desc: This service exposes measurement data from an environmental sensor intended for sports and fitness applications. A wide range of environmental parameters is supported.

characteristics.name: Humidity
characteristics.desc:
Unit is in percent with a resolution of 0.01 
percent

characteristics.name: Temperature
characteristics.desc: Unit is in degrees Celsius with a resolution of 0.01 degrees Celsius

characteristics.name: DF_POS
characteristics.desc: Driver side front shock position reading

characteristics.name: PF_POS
characteristics.desc: Passenger side front shock position reading

characteristics.name: DR_POS
characteristics.desc: Driver side rear shock position reading

characteristics.name: PR_POS
characteristics.desc: Passenger side rear shock position reading
